name: Two 3rd Dimension
description:
How to Play :  W A S D to move

'R' to restart level (in case of collision bugs)

Story :  You are trapped in a dungeon and your only hope to escape is to guide the arrow through multiple traps and reach the end.Sounds easy right? But there is a twist! ...

Credits:-

Programmer - Shivansh Ahuja

Artist - Harsh Pal

UI - Bhavuk Arora
